news.title: Uber Boosts AI with Segments.ai Acquisition for Advanced Data Labeling
news.body: Uber has strategically acquired Segments.ai, a leader in multi-sensor data labeling for AI applications, to enhance its capabilities in autonomous driving technologies. This acquisition underscores Uber's commitment to advancing its AI-driven technological infrastructure, positioning it at the forefront of innovation in autonomous mobility.

news.title: Oracle Faces Security Breach, Cybercriminals Demand $50M Ransom
news.body: Oracle is grappling with a major security breach as cybercriminals have infiltrated its E-Business Suite, demanding ransoms up to $50 million. This incident highlights the escalating security challenges that major tech companies face, emphasizing the need for robust cybersecurity measures in protecting sensitive corporate data.

news.title: ECB Partners with AI Firm Feedzai for Digital Euro Fraud Prevention
news.body: The European Central Bank has chosen Feedzai, a leading AI startup, to implement fraud detection for the digital euro. This collaboration is pivotal in ensuring the security and reliability of Europe's forthcoming digital currency, marking a significant step in the ECB's digital transformation journey.

news.title: Mastercard Unveils New Ad Platform Leveraging Consumer Transaction Data
news.body: Mastercard has launched a digital media network that utilizes transaction data to provide personalized advertising solutions. This move not only aims to boost marketing effectiveness but also reflects the growing trend of leveraging financial data to enhance consumer engagement strategies in the digital age.

news.title: Remitee Raises $20M to Expand Embedded Cross-Border Payment Solutions
news.body: Remitee has secured $20 million in funding to enhance its embedded remittance services for banks, fintechs, and retailers. This investment will significantly improve the efficiency and accessibility of global financial transactions, reinforcing the importance of seamless integration in financial services.
